ygData.subject: Predaking
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I have been talking with aj (gestalt_predaking@hotmail.com), and he says he has been very busy with college and work, and probably won t be able to post

OOC: I have been talking with aj (gestalt_predaking@...), 
and he says he has been very busy with college and work, and 
probably won't be able to post with his characters for a while (which 
is also why he hasn't posted for a long time). He wanted me to 
control Predaking and the G1 Predacons for a while, till he has 
enough time to start posting again. So, I will post for Predaking, 
Razorclaw, Rampage, and Divebomb. Jeremiah will be posting for 
Tantrum and Headstrong.

::Predaking::
He has been thinking for a while (no kidding eh =P). Megatron has 
left, no surprise to him. <I wonder where he is...> Predaking splits 
into the Predacons, who land in a circle all facing each other. 

::Razorclaw/Divebomb/Rampage::
Razorclaw steps forward, "Grrrrr, Megatron must be found," He 
opens a commlink to Megatron, "Megatron, this is Razorclaw and 
the Predacons. We are currently at the crash site. What is your 
current location?" He transforms into Lion mode, and lays himself 
down on the ground. 

Rampage looks around, getting angry, "Grrrrrr," he whips out his 
gun, and destroys several trees some distance away from the 
group on the island. He grips his gun tightly, wanting to destroy 
some more, and barely manages to stop himself from completing 
his desires, for now.

Divebomb transforms, and flies up, soaring in circles over head for 
a few moments, then lands on the top of an unmolested tree.
